channel.title: Thieving help :S
channel.description:
hey guys,
so i got this problem with the thieving stall [first one] that ppl can keep pressing it and keep getting money , the fast he press the fast he got money .. (about 3m per 3 mints) . , so i wanna make something that well stop this and only get 10k each thiev (not per click) .
pic :[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img12/7162/whwtyyetydsg.png[/img]
thanks.

item.title: Thieving help :S
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

If you are delta just do a food delay, simple as that.

Read full topic

item.title: Thieving help :S
item.dc:creator: @mkti1 mkti1
item.description:
@mkti1 wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:2, topic:462509”]3m per 3 mints? That’s damn good.

You’ll need a timer to regulate when they get the reward.

Declare

public int thievingTimer;

Under process

if (thievingTimer > 0) {
thievingTimer--;
}

Within your thieving method or whatever you use.

if (thievingTimer > 0) {
return;
}

Oh yeah you’ll need to actually set thievingTimer a value when they click the stall…

thievingTimer = 10; [/quote]

could u team view me ? idk where to put all that

Read full topic

item.title: Thieving help :S
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

3m per 3 mints? That’s damn good.

You’ll need a timer to regulate when they get the reward.

Declare

public int thievingTimer;

Under process

if (thievingTimer > 0) {
thievingTimer--;
}

Within your thieving method or whatever you use.

if (thievingTimer > 0) {
return;
}

Oh yeah you’ll need to actually set thievingTimer a value when they click the stall…

thievingTimer = 10;

Read full topic
